content: ***about this pattern*** crochet your own flower puff shawl using this crochet pattern in pdf format the finished dimensions are 50cm / 19 5 height and 165cm / 65 width when lying flat this pattern contains written instructions in english and uses us crochet terminology the printable pdf has a total of 4 pages including the cover page available as an instant download --- ***materials needed*** clover crochet hook 4mm us g/6 hook clover stitch markers clover tassel maker clover bent tip tapestry needle set chibi scissors --- ***questions & returns*** there are no returns on digital files please contact me if you have questions about the pattern --- ***please note *** please note that this is an ad-free and special formatted pdf version of my free crochet pattern that can be found on my linked blog by purchasing this pattern you support me in making more free patterns ***find me on social media*** patterns https //wilmade com instagram https //instagram com/wilmawestenberg facebook https //www facebook com/bywilmade/ pinterest https //pinterest com/wilmawestenberg youtube https //www youtube com/c/wilmawestenberg
